description: From 20M to 300M altitude in 2.3K.  Small little hike that works the heart pretty good.  Amazing view of Cultus lake and surrounding areas.  Beginners will enjoy the view, various pitstop lookouts, and there are many info signs that kids enjoy reading that give great detail on the surrounding area.  Experienced hikers will enjoy the heart pounding uphill adventure, with many side trails to discover.NTS Map: 092H04.
directions: Head towards Cultus Lake from Chilliwack.  Pass through Main Beach and continue on past all public beaches.  Watch your left side to see the parking lot of Tea Pot Hill.
title: Tea Pot Hill
